description: It just needs a little fix to work with 22.04 dark mode https://askubuntu.com/questions/1403907/variety-not-working-in-dark-mode-on-ubuntu-22-04-lts
Hopefully someone will fix the dark mode issue with this app.
summary: Works nicely except in dark mode

description: My GNOME desktop setup is incomplete without Variety. Because Variety does what GNOME desktop doesn't.
I wish it had an option to set different wallpapers for the different screens.
summary: Works and does what it is said

description: For some reason, this app will not work for me in Fedora 36. Installed it, configured it, and nothing. This used to be my goto app for wallpapers. Sad. Oh well, I'll do something else in the meanwhile, I'm sure it will get fixed.
summary: Didn't work for me in Fedora 36

description: Feels like KDE in GNOME
Fedora 36: Installs, allows preferences to be set (change on the hour), and one image appears; other than than, images do not change and there is no panel icon - basically useless.
Pixels mode and blur mode could be better, but it works fine
I wish the author would update this app to work in 22.04
Been using for years. Has many cool features such as downloading images from reddit subs/ rss and filtering pics by 4k, etc.
after updating xubuntu it will not start. When ran from a terminal it says the time format is not supported.

If you like wallpapers this is the app to have, if not I wouldn't bother.

The "Quotes" functionality is nice as well.

works great, quotes function with any random subject, multiple folders and a lot of photos, plus any photo site ever, filters for colors and other cool stuff that can all be randomized and selected the frequency of that randomness, it's most appealing quality is the special ability to pop up your most embarrassing photo at the perfectly wrong timing when people look at your screen. or even better when it's connected to a projector or a big screen. anyway. pros and cons. sounds like a good idea to install it for a while... do it

I am new to linux. This was one of the first apps I installed on my ubuntu 18 environment. It was easy to install and works as described. The developer has included his flickr photos as an optional wallpaper source and his photos are some of the best.
Works great on Ubuntu 18.04!
It is great, it does exactly what you want it to do. My only concern and thus only 4 stars, is that I feel it consumes a lot of ram: 170mb at the moment...why?
summary: I've been using it for years, it is great!

description: recomended this apllication
Not working on Debian 10.
If you use nice pictures sources, good surprises are guaranteed.
summary: It is that kind of app that makes you enjoy using your computer

description: does exactly exactly what it says
It worked like charm

I installed to try it out, but after I uninstalled it still was downloading and applying wallpapers. I had to reinstall it, disable it's features, and then uninstall it again. Plus, removing it's install directory.
summary: Does what it says but doesn't fully uninstall

description: Most repositories just don't work...

I tried this application to display predefined backgrounds and quotes. I like the way it's designed, but I couldn't have the quotes being displayed properly, and it caused some problems during video streaming. As there was a few other bugs, I removed it so it won't cause bigger issues...
Awesome tool to have wallpapers
You'll love this app if you enjoy fresh wallpapers and quotes! Some wallpapers could be sharper though.
I use it for a few years now. I love the random wallpapers and quotes. It makes the screen into some work of art every time I look to it.
It works, it's effective, it's well done. After I install LInux, I install this application.
Great and complete
First thing i install, always works perfectly

Saved some pictures for later use and i've just noticed all of them have advertising logo (name) of the author imprinted on them even though, i'm sure, he is not the owner of a single one of those pictures! 

Under creative license i know people are allowed to share bought or otherwise obtained images but falsely claiming the ownership by stamping your logo on other people's work being allowed is something i haven't find in ToS of any of the source websites, though i will read them all again to verify it. 

In any way -would not recommend. There are better alternatives that save pictures as they are.
summary: Horrible! Pics ruined by the false ownership claim logo of the author!

description: My system shows that this is trojan downloader.
Easy to use and automatic selection of photos.

works. always
works. always
Great, many options to customize, try and see

This wall paper changer is amazing, it has a lot of options to setup the background images from multiple sources.

It has the possibility of adding a cite as the program fortune does in console.

A must-have.
It is very good but lacks feature to resize an image so that it either fills, fits or replicates across the screen. Fills by default which cut out long images or unusual resolution images.
summary: no option to fit a wallpaper

description: Like just about every wallpaper manager in Linux, this program doesn't understand the concept of more than 1 monitor. So it stretches the wallpaper to fit both monitors. Fine if you can be bothered to create a photo with the correct resolution but that just seems like too much hard work.
summary: Not for use with dual monitors

description: you should read terms and conditions you accept to give your ip and 3rd parties pics
And it has so many options, too! Random inspirational quotes are its best feature imo
Simple UX. I like it.
Really love the application! It gathers wallpapers from variery of sources gives you choices. I wish there was choice for setting the type.
Omg, this software is awesome! Let's make GNU/Linux better by making good software like this one!
very cool app with many cool features
After i installed this i was getting a constant error from both system and this app that it stopped working. The functionality is good though.

This software is very good, but you forgot one little thing, the pause button, along with the next button. It would be very good, cause sometimes we love some wallpaper, and want to set it for a few days before move to the next wallpaper.
summary: Very good, miss one little feature

description: Variety is an excellent wallpaper manager. It is lightweight, easy to configure and forget about. Excellent.

There are a lot of settings whihc allows to set filters tailored for me. it is possible to add variety of sources such as reddit, unsplash and so on. super cool, thank you very much. 

PS. donated for a cofe.
summary: its a really cool app for Ubuntu

description: Variety itself is great, but comes with bloatware called ImageMagick which cannot be removed. Apparently it's used to apply filters to the wallpapers, but it looks very sketchy and has zero use outside of those filters.
Kindly mention in OP how to remove trash ImageMagic bloatware (DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS )
Best option to change wallpaper
Easy to add pics to lively up my desktop
simple & easy to setup sources
Works as advertised. Has been installed for 4 years and has survied multiple major version upgrades of the OS without a single issue.

It works like a charm.

Please add these features for local images in the options:
*Rotate vertical images (will keep original intact)
*merge 3, 4 or 5 random vertical images to make a landscae wallpaper!

It would be |@#½~½ awesome!

Variety works great as an app but the reason for the 5 stars is the curated image sources are so good. Along with the ability to add your own online sources as well as directory images, it is IMO the best wallpaper util for all platforms. I think there is no port to Windoze, so this is great reason for a Windoze user to make the switch.
summary: A compelling reason to switch to Linux

description:
- Works seamlessly after initial configuration
- Multiple online sources for wallpapers including Bing, Google, NASA, Unspalsh
- Highly customizable
- Wallpaper changing times can be set
- Clock or Quotes can be superimposed over wallpapers
just love having the wallpapers changing all the time
couldnt expect anything more
But somehow feels a bit messy.
Does exactly what it's meant to do and does it well
got  what i need
its really convenient so im not wasting a bunch of time looking for random pictures for my wallpaper
It does exactly what it says it does, and easy to use. I don't know what else to say.
Works just as it should
Adds variety to my desktop and a surprise every time
summary: Does what its suppost to do

description: Shows variety of wallpapers as name suggest with info for each picture. Its really great. Thanks.
Works great! I have been using it for years!
ipjkl[;'ubyhinjomklp[.;]/'

This is the best way to have a slideshow of desktop wallpapers in Gnome. Variety gives an amazing bunch of options, then it gets out of your way. 
Don't forget to install the Gnome Extension "AppIndicator and KStatusNotifierItem Support" if you're using Fedora so that you can see the Indicator Icon in the top bar. 
Unfortunately it doesn't wash my car on Saturday mornings, but you can't have everything.
I downlaoded 'wallpaper downloader' but that did not work. This app is flawless. Tanks.
I jus found this app, and love it so much.

Pulls images from a variety of sources, including local folders, NASA, Flickr, Unsplash, Google Earth. Has loads of interesting customisation options. The best wallpaper-changing app I've ever used, on Mac or on Linux. Fantastic! Thank you!
Love that you can pull images from different sources and the Quotes feature are top notch too. My desktop feels much more alive now!
Lots of customization

I loved this App as it was a nice wallpaper changer but since I upgraded to Ubuntu 22.04, it doesn't work as it should. Doesn't switch between wallpapers and uninstalling it doesn't remove it completely. The screen clock feature is off too. :(
summary: Doesn't work properly on new Ubuntu 22.04

description: This was such a great app, but it stopped working a couple of weeks ago on my Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS. I have not upgraded to the new 22.04 LTS as of yet, but it has still stopped working. It does not automatically change desktop pictures or quotes and you can not manually change them either. Uninstalling and reinstalling did not help. I looked at there website and others have complained about this as well but there were no responses that I could find. The link here in the Software store on Ubuntu has the wrong Website linked, but I searched both and found nothing from the dev. I guess this may be another dead app. No to search for a replacement again.
It keeps my desktop fresh without me having to worry about it , I'm a fan.
Works like a charm for a couple of days then it freezes the display.
Gimmick mit der Uhr sehr schick und informativ. Sehr brauchbar...
summary: Macht das perfekt was es soll. Klares must have

Muy buena pero no activen la opción de reloj porque crea un fondo x minuto (cuando cambia la hora) y aunque reemplaza el fondo viejo imagino consume cpu x minuto.

Very good but dont activate clock, because it creates 1 wallpaper each time the hour changes (1xmin) even if it replaces the old one i assume it still consumes your cpu each minute
muy buena, la recomiendo

La app es buenisima, aunque mas por un gusto personal, me gustaria poder configurar los fondos, es decir que cuando copie un fondo a favoritos, despues de un tiempo de esta accion pueda escoger que se muestren solo los favoritos y que tambien se puedan controlar un poco los patrones de fondos mas alla de donde son extraidos
Funciona perfecta
hace varios años que la uso y cada año se supera , felicitaciones

description: Permite guardar la imagen de fondo de pantalla, saltear a la siguiente, elegir intervalos de tiempo. Sumamente intuitiva y amigable!

muy fachayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
gracias manuel por recomendarme esta app para buscar wallpapers de monas chinas

Excelente, muy variada e imagenes en HD

Il m'est devenu indispensable.. Configurable à souhait. On défini les sources d'images que l'on souhaite. On peut mettre une horlogea avec la date en surimpression. Cela fait maintenant des années que je l'utilise. Juste excellent ! Merci aux dévelloppeur..

Très très bon (de mon point de vue).
En plus de permettre le changement automatique du fond d'écran (avec intervalle réglable) , le programme permet d'afficher/personnaliser des citations.
Vraiment propre.
Je conseille !!

J'aime beaucoup.
Fonctionne très bien sous Linuxmint et Fedora, mais je n'arrive pas à le lancer (et donc à faire quoi que ce soit avec) sous OpenSUSE Leap 15.1. Peut-être y a t-il conflit avec un autre programme ? (puisque Variety est bien disponible via Yast donc reconnu compatible avec OpenSUSE)
tres bonne application
Franchement, rien à dire, ça fait le job et ça le fait bien!
superbes images

description: Pour les sources d'images externes, comme ce qu'il est possible de faire en "important" (certains) albums Flickr, avoir la possibilité équivalente chez Wikipedia/Wikimedia et Pixabay serait parfait.
Super soft, tout simple mais qui permet de bien agrémenter le quotidien avec des fonds d'écrans qui changent réguliérement sur lesquels nous pouvons ajouter des citations inspirantes. Merci !
Super application !

description: Самый небходимый функционал: можно ставить таймер смены обоев, выбирать смену при каждом запуске, можно задавать папку в качестве источника или выбрать вообще все картинки, можно выбирать отдельные файлы, а так же подгружать картинки с он-лайн источников, которые тоже можно задать "вручную". Рекомендую!
Работает, скачивает, много настроек, и хорошая навигация по нимм
